title: John Legend | Trump Lost the 2020 Election, but Republicans Are Trying to Steal It: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at the historic repudiation of Donald Trump that ended with Rudy Giuliani screaming outside a landscaping company.

Then, he talks to musician and activist John Legend.
